wikipedia_page.main: Ken Harper (15 April 1917 – February 1994) was an English professional footballer who played as a full back, making 50 appearances in the Football League between 1946 and 1949 for Bradford City.

response: *Ken Harper (footballer, born 1917) (1917–1994), English footballer for Bradford City
*Ken Harper (footballer, born 1924) (1924–2010), English footballer for Shrewsbury Town
